Edge locations around the world the regions are Illustrated with

independently run and operated data centers that have very different failure
characteristics so that you can uh be much more assured of your workloads
staying operational even the very best industry practices still uh no matter what all
the providers do there's still the possibility of failures including failures um at a very high level such as

available application we actually uh strongly recommend that you balance your

centers that are highly connected with high-speed networking among the data centers this enables certain types of
storage plat operations and platforms notably our S3 storage service which we'll talk about to automatically
replicate data among the availability zones so that when you do a right operation to the S3 storage system it
will automatically be copied amongst multiple data centers however we do not
automatically copy across data centers or or I'm sorry across regions and this
is also critically important because it gives you control over data locality so if you are operating for
example in our our European region which is based in the Dublin area there will
be replication automatically within the region but your data will never leave that region except under your own

any way cause it to migrate from that region so that's a critical capability
um both the reliability within a region but also the ability to think of these
